short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CartBlocker - Break Free from Impulse Shopping. Saves you money by blocking you from buying things you don't need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CartBlocker helps you stay in control of your purchases by blocking "buy," "cart," and "purchase" buttons on websites. Whether youâ€™re browsing out of boredom or feeling tempted by promotions, CartBlocker removes the impulse triggers, helping you save money and focus on what you truly need.
